title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, they are displayed in different formats in dynamic text items and data/text items in the application.
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table exhibit inconsistent formatting when displayed in dynamic text items and data/text items.
EB: The expected behavior is that datetime values should be displayed consistently in the same format in both dynamic text items and data/text items.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Access the application.
2. Insert a dynamic text item containing a datetime value.
3. Insert a data/text item containing the same datetime value.
